text_block_list.text:
#GoingToTrain #SoHot 
#CurrenUsesBabySuncreen #I'mGonnaDoMyBest♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Now then. Onee-chan's probably waiting for me.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Now then. Onee-chan's probably waiting for me.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Ara. So this is where you were, Curren-san.
text_block_list.name: 上級生のウマ娘A

text_block_list.text:
Is now a good time? 
Why don't we have a little "chat" with one another?
text_block_list.name: 上級生のウマ娘B

text_block_list.text:
It's already past when we usually meet up for training 
and Curren Chan still isn't here.  She also hasn't 
updated her Umastagram in over an hour.

Eh? Curren-san didn't show up for training? 
Wait, don't tell me… did those girls from earlier…
text_block_list.name: カレンのクラスメイト

text_block_list.text:
Well you see, a little while ago some upper class 
students were talking to her.  Something seemed 
off about the whole situation though…
text_block_list.name: カレンのクラスメイト

text_block_list.text:
I was worried something might happen to her so I offered to come 
along, but she said everything would be fine. I felt like I 
shouldn't press the matter so I let her go without another word…
text_block_list.name: カレンのクラスメイト

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san!? Curren-san is probably behind the main school 
building…! So please, go help her!
text_block_list.name: カレンのクラスメイト

text_block_list.text:
I rushed out, heading to where Curren Chan might be. 
I found her behind the main school building, 
surrounded by multiple upper class students…!
Ah, Onee-chan! What are you doing here?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Ah, Onee-chan! What are you doing here?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Ah! Don't tell me, has training already started!? 
Ahh, I'm so sorry!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Will you ever forgive me…?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
choice_data_list: That's not the reason I'm here…

text_block_list.text:
Ah, did you come here because of my Senpais? 
Don't worry, our "chat" is already over.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Isn't that right? Senpai ♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!
text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirls

text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I'm so glad I was able to bond with my Senpais! 
Please continue to support me from here on out ☆
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!
text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirls

text_block_list.text:
Yup, that's the perfect response♪ 
And don't forget to follow me on Umastagram ☆
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Anyway, see you all later ♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna go get changed. 
Onee-chan, I'll meet you at the racecourse!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
choice_data_list: So what was that all about…?

text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna go get changed. 
Onee-chan, I'll meet you at the racecourse!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
choice_data_list: So what was that all about…?

text_block_list.text: Ehh…? It was nothing much, you know?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
At first they didn't seem to like me very much. 
So, after our little "chat" they 
understood just how cute I really am ♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Yup. It seemed like there was a little bit of a misunderstanding 
between us, but I took care of it! They immediately fell in love 
with me while we were chatting ♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
I'm kinda interested in their secret "chat" but 
there's something more important that I wanted to say…
choice_data_list: I wish you didn't go alone.

text_block_list.text:
While you may have been able to solve the problem this time, what 
if you hadn't? That is always a possibility, so I explained to 
her that she didn't have to do everything by herself:  that she 
could rely on those around her.

Hehehe, you don't have to worry. 
I'm used to these kinds of things you know? 
After all, cute girls always stand out.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Plus I wouldn't want to get those other girls involved 
in these kinds of things.  It'll be easier to deal 
with them if it's just me as well.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Onee-chan… When these kinds of things happen I solve 
them in a cute manner. I'm happy that you were so 
worried about me, but during times like these there's 
only one thing for you to say, right?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Onee-chan… When these kinds of things happen I solve 
them in a cute manner. I'm happy that you were so 
worried about me, but during times like these there's 
only one thing for you to say, right?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Yup, there's only one thing that I want to hear from you. 
 
You know what it is, don't you, Onee-chan…?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
choice_data_list: <size=35>Curren, you're the cutest girl in the universe…</size>

text_block_list.text:
Yup, there's only one thing that I want to hear from you. 
 
You know what it is, don't you, Onee-chan…?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
choice_data_list: <size=35>Curren, you're the cutest girl in the universe…</size>

text_block_list.text:
I am, aren't I? ♪ Now then, we're done with 
this conversation, right? I'm going to go get ready!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
I was pulled around by Curren Chan once again… 
Will there ever come a day that I truly understand her…?
